languages.text: "Момент упущен, Версериан. Культистка уже мнила себя избранной из-за некоего шепота, а вкусив еще больше власти, она и не подумает останавливаться".
languages.translation_comment:
Having become the new Vizsier, Kibellah has corrupted the death cult.
Abelard: "I cannot approve of how the Bloodspun Web seeks to lord it over the crew. We may acknowledge the spinners, but that does not make them superior to our officers!"

languages.text: "That ship has sailed, Werserian. The cultist already thought herself chosen before, all because of some whisper she alone could hear. And now that she has had a taste of greater power, there is no chance that she will stop."
languages.translation_comment:

traits.locale_text: "That ship has sailed, Werserian. The cultist already thought herself chosen before, because of some whisper she alone could hear, and now that she has had a taste of more power, there is no chance she'll stop."

"That ship has sailed, Werserian. The cultist already thought herself chosen before, all because of some whisper she alone could hear. And now that she has had a taste of greater power, there is no chance that she will stop."

languages.text: 「ウェルザリアン、その船はもう出てしまったぞ。あのカルト信者は、自分だけが囁き聞けるという理由で、自分が選ばれたと思い込んでいた。そして今、より大きな力を味わってしまった以上、彼女が止まる可能性はまったくない」
languages.original_text: "That ship has sailed, Werserian. The cultist already thought herself chosen before, all because of some whisper she alone could hear. And now that she has had a taste of greater power, there is no chance that she will stop."

traits.locale_text: 「ウェルザリアン、その船はもう出てしまったぞ。あのカルト信者は、自分だけが囁き聞けるという理由で、自分が選ばれたと思い込んでいた。そして今、より大きな力を味わってしまった以上、彼女が止まる可能性はまったくない」

languages.text: "Dieses Schiff hat abgelegt, Werserian. Die Kultistin hielt sich bereits vorher für auserwählt, nur wegen irgendeines Flüsterns, das außer ihr niemand hörte. Und da sie nun einen Vorgeschmack auf größere Macht erhalten hat, besteht keine Chance mehr, dass sie aufhört."
languages.original_text: "That ship has sailed, Werserian. The cultist already thought herself chosen before, all because of some whisper she alone could hear. And now that she has had a taste of greater power, there is no chance that she will stop."

traits.locale_text: "Dieses Schiff hat abgelegt, Werserian. Die Kultistin hielt sich bereits vorher für auserwählt, nur wegen irgendeines Flüsterns, das außer ihr niemand hörte. Und da sie nun einen Vorgeschmack auf größere Macht erhalten hat, besteht keine Chance mehr, dass sie aufhört."

languages.text: «Ya es tarde para eso, Werserian. La cultista ya se creía una elegida antes, por unos susurros que solo ella oía. Ahora que ha degustado el verdadero poder, será imposible que se detenga».
languages.original_text: "That ship has sailed, Werserian. The cultist already thought herself chosen before, all because of some whisper she alone could hear. And now that she has had a taste of greater power, there is no chance that she will stop."

traits.locale_text: «Ya es tarde para eso, Werserian. La cultista ya se creía una elegida antes, por unos susurros que solo ella oía. Ahora que ha degustado el verdadero poder, será imposible que se detenga».

languages.text: “已经没有回头路了，韦尔森。以前，这个邪教徒不过是听到了某些语焉不详的低语，就敢断言自己是神选之人。如今，她已经亲自体会到了更大的权力，不可能再停下来了。”
languages.original_text: "That ship has sailed, Werserian. The cultist already thought herself chosen before, all because of some whisper she alone could hear. And now that she has had a taste of greater power, there is no chance that she will stop."

traits.locale_text: “已经没有回头路了，韦尔森。以前，这个邪教徒不过是听到了某些语焉不详的低语，就敢断言自己是神选之人。如今，她已经亲自体会到了更大的权力，不可能再停下来了。”

languages.text: "O gemi kalkalı çok oldu Werserian. O kâfir kadın, sadece kendisinin duyabildiği bir fısıltı yüzünden kendini seçilmiş sanıyordu zaten. Şimdi de daha büyük bir gücün tadını aldı. Artık hiç durmaz."
languages.original_text: "That ship has sailed, Werserian. The cultist already thought herself chosen before, all because of some whisper she alone could hear. And now that she has had a taste of greater power, there is no chance that she will stop."

traits.locale_text: "O gemi kalkalı çok oldu Werserian. O kâfir kadın, sadece kendisinin duyabildiği bir fısıltı yüzünden kendini seçilmiş sanıyordu zaten. Şimdi de daha büyük bir gücün tadını aldı. Artık hiç durmaz."

languages.original_text: "That ship has sailed, Werserian. The cultist already thought herself chosen before, all because of some whisper she alone could hear. And now that she has had a taste of greater power, there is no chance that she will stop."

languages.text: « Il est trop tard, Werserian. La fanatique s'est déjà crue élue sur la seule base d'un murmure qu'elle seule pouvait entendre. Et maintenant qu'elle a goûté à un pouvoir supérieur, il n'y a plus aucune chance qu'elle s'arrête. »
languages.original_text: "That ship has sailed, Werserian. The cultist already thought herself chosen before, all because of some whisper she alone could hear. And now that she has had a taste of greater power, there is no chance that she will stop."

traits.locale_text: « Il est trop tard, Werserian. La fanatique s'est déjà crue élue sur la seule base d'un murmure qu'elle seule pouvait entendre. Et maintenant qu'elle a goûté à un pouvoir supérieur, il n'y a plus aucune chance qu'elle s'arrête. »
